name: Forbidden Arms: Bloodlust
description:
This game is currently in active development and the downloadable is its current in-game battle alpha demo.  Soon, you will be able to talk to npc's explore towns and dungeons and battle demons and giants.

GAME INFO:

Forbidden Arms: Bloodlust is a hack and slash action side scroller that features unlimited combo system and epic fights against ninjas, demons and giant bosses.

Slay endless hordes of the Mugen Kage Demon clan with your blood-thirsty sword. 

Double edged: Drink your enemy's blood else, yours will be drained by the power of the mysterious vampire relic sword.

If you like what you see, please consider donating or pledging in the patreon page!

This game has a NSFW version.
